articles.title: Championship: Cardiff City and Swansea City eye progress as they return to action - BBC
articles.description: As Cardiff City and Swansea City return to Championship action, BBC Sport Wales assesses the season so far - and what may be to come.
articles.content:
Swansea beat Cardiff 2-0 in October to become the first side to claim three successive south Wales derby league wins
The World Cup continues, but the Championship's mid-season break is at an end.
